text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's a fine afternoon day.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I suddenly have the urge to go<n>shopping somewhere I
haven't been<n>to before. Along the way though, I get<n>
myself completely lost...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. I'm sorry to intrude.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Would you happen to be a trainer at<n>Tracen Academy?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I am. Why do you ask?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I knew it. I believe I've seen you<n>at school several
times. I recognized<n>your face.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Incidentally, you seem to be having<n>some difficulties. What
troubles you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grateful for Grass Wonder's<n>concern, I explain that it's my
first<n>time in the area and I've gotten lost.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Now, that's a predicament indeed!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
If you do not object, I would be<n>pleased to guide you to the
school.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Of course. I was just on my way<n>back, and as they say, "No
road is<n>long with good company." ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I often come this way to buy items for<n>my hobby, so I'm
familiar with the<n>area. Just leave everything to me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Shall we be on our way?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I take the generous student up on her<n>offer, and we walk at
a relaxed pace<n>toward the academy.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Phew... We're almost there now.<n>Tracen is only a short
distance from<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, the sun is already setting. I<n>must have been walking
too leisurely...<n>Forgive me.
choice_data_list:
No worries. I got to enjoy the view along the
way.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Is that right? You must have an<n>appreciation for the fleeting
nature of<n>things.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
...When the evening comes, the sky<n>remains beautiful, its
crimson hues<n>ever-changing.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I could keep on watching forever...<n>I'm afraid that's what
kept me at<n>such a dallying pace.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Grass Wonder voices these<n>musings, we come to a halt
and gaze<n>together at the sky above. But<n>suddenly...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Gurgle...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, could it be?
choice_data_list: Sorry, that really ruined the moment...
Sorry, that really ruined the moment...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hehe, not to worry. It was a longwalk. You must be famished.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Here, I have the perfect thing for that.<n>May I trouble you for
a bit more of<n>your time?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
If you'd like, I would be pleased to<n>thank you by performing
a Nodate.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Yes, an open-air tea ceremony. It's<n>the elegant tradition of
enjoying tea<n>while feeling the warm sunlight and<n>fresh air.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Tea ceremony is one of my hobbies. I<n>made the long
journey today to order<n>matcha tea and sweets at my
favorite<n>store.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I have all the necessary items with<n>me. What do you say?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Wonderful. ♪ Then I'll get everything<n>ready.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder performs the<n>ceremony, and we enjoy
some<n>delicious tea and fine sweets.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: How was it?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Heehee, I'm glad to hear that. ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
The wonder and joy of tea is in its<n>ability to satisfy both the
body and<n>soul.
choice_data_list: Have you studied tea ceremony long?
Have you studied tea ceremony long?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Yes, since I was a child.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Tea ceremony, flower arrangement,<n>calligraphy, Japanese
dance... And a<n>bit of the naginata polearm as well.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, they're just hobbies of mine<n>that I take immense
pleasure in<n>indulging.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I was born in America, but both my<n>parents dearly love
Japan.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
They explained the elegance of<n>Japanese culture to me
often... So I<n>naturally came to have an interest in<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
There were fine instructors back<n>home, so I asked my
parents to let me<n>learn all that I could.
choice_data_list: You must really love Japanese culture.
You must really love Japanese culture.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Yes, that I do!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I owe many important lessons to<n>it—from civility and
sincerity, to<n>consideration for others.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Though of course, I yet have much to<n>learn.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I train every day to be polite and<n>refined—to one day reach
the<n>Japanese ideal of Yamato Nadeshiko.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh... I'm sorry. I've been going on<n>and on about myself.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Let's make our way back to the<n>academy. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After we part ways, I return to my<n>room.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder, the polite and refined<n>student. I wonder
what a racer who<n>serves tea ceremonies and smiles so<n>
peacefully can run like.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Little did I know, my answer was to<n>come much sooner than
expected.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "Notice to all trainers regarding the<n>upcoming tryouts."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I receive an email containing the list of<n>participants, and
Grass Wonder's<n>name immediately catches my eye.
